content: I noticed SUSHI does not check if Ids are unique per FSH-Tank... Is this deliberate or just not yet implemented? Currently, the last resource with the id just overwrites all previous resources.

Hi @Noemi Deppenwiese -- it's not deliberate. I actually filed a bug on this a while back (#152), but we haven't got to it yet. I think maybe it went out of sight out of mind. Thanks for the reminder!
